name: SYNTHETIC VALK - 'Cus they couldn't fit the "YRIE"
name_original: SYNTHETIC VALK - 'Cus they couldn't fit the "YRIE"
description:
"I'm hoping to get a game with JRPG elements with an emotional story. My favorite part about JRPGs are catchy music, memorable music and humor."

SYNTHETIC VALK is a short alt-RPG created for the Secret Santa Jam 2020. Unintentionally very similar to my last game, play as a budding pianist and guitarist as they get their first actual interview...
before everything goes horribly wrong.

Featuring:

  • A custom-made soundtrack
  • An *almost* 1-bit aesthetic (RPG Maker does not wish to comply with my demands)
  • Roughly 10 minutes of gameplay - short but sweet
  • The ability to open every cabinet and make some poor intern close them all behind you the next day if there is a next day
  • Small secrets and easter-eggs. Try and find them all!

Look out for possible expansions in the future!

Use the arrow keys to move, Z to interact with stuff, X to open the menu and go back. And... that's about it, really.
